value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 21: Beyond Report Development - Part 2
value.excerpt: In this video, we demonstrate publishing a report, and then show how to embed it using URL access, and also how to create a subscription. value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.excerpt: There are many useful transformations in Power Query for Power BI. One of them is adding the prefix and suffix to a text column. value.title: Aggregated Table in Power BI   Using GroupBy Function in DAX
value.excerpt: There are many different ways you can create aggregations in Power BI, You can do it in the source (using the database t-SQL language), or using Group By operation in Power Query. You can also do it in DAX using some functions. One of the functions that can be used for grouping and aggregation is Group

value.title: Building a Virtual Relationship in Power BI   Basics of TREATAS DAX Function
value.excerpt: TreatAs is an interesting function with multiple use cases in Power BI. Let's see how you can use this function.
